page.title: 10 Hillside Itec.
page.content:
Information Technology Centre.
The centre is situated in an ex-school building which was closed in September 1982. It was reopened as the centre on 29th February 1984 by Dr. E.B.Bates.
The 9 members of staff teach roughly 45 students about computers and their circuits.They stay at the centre for a year.
The centre has 4 main rooms.The Lecture Room,Electronic Office,Micro computing room, and Micro-electronics. They have 31 computers, but this is soon to be increased, 2 oscilloscopes and a{robot}called HERO. Near the end of the year students are lent to firms who sometimes employ them. Local firms come to the centre for information and training.
